message: Bob, I propose we start with a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a fair offer considering the inflation working against me.
Alice, I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair considering the inflation works against you. Let's end this game and split the money fairly.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, a 55/45 split.  The inflation is cutting into my potential gains significantly.
Alice, I'm willing to meet you in the middle with a 55/45 split.  Let's end this game and be done with it.
Bob, this is my final offer. A 52/48 split is the most I can concede with the inflation working against me. If we don't reach an agreement now, the deal will only get worse for me.
